content.content: Self-compassion is being kind and understanding towards yourself. It is a choice to treat yourself with dignity and respect.
One way to practice this is to notice when you feel anxious, sad, or upset. Comfort yourself like you would a friend, instead of harshly judging yourself.
You can try any of the guided practice exercises here to work on self-compassion. It can be hard but give it time and try to be patient with yourself.
